page.title: 18Peace Interview
page.content: There are about 10 people who live in Kirkpatrick Durham who are members of the CND. They are trying to end nuclear weapons in Britain and all over the world. They hope the world will come to its senses and scrap the nuclear weapons. At Greenham Common there are appalling conditions. In the winter the people that were there nearly died. The activities that they take part in are wire cutting, singing, talking, chanting and barrackading the gates with people or wire. The rest of the people in the village think it is a waste of time and they won't get anywhere by protesting against it. Most people don't like nuclear weapons, but they think they are a necessary evil.
